subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am will be only Padraig Harrington’s third tournament in the last 10 weeks, although he is working harder than ever to refine and slightly retool his swing.
snippet: The AT&T Pebble Beach National Pro-Am will be only Padraig Harrington’s third tournament in the last 10 weeks, although he is working harder than ever to refine and slightly retool his swing.
